summary: Hairpin Match Designer feature testing complete. All 8 backend API tests pass. Frontend UI testing confirms modal opens, shows SWR sweep chart, power analysis, driven element shortening guidance, and Apply Recipe button works correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Hairpin Match Designer fully verified with new tests. Backend endpoint POST /api/hairpin-designer returns: recipe (rod_dia, rod_spacing, z0, ideal_hairpin_length_in, swr_at_best, shorten_per_side_in, shortened_total_length_in), length_sweep array (swr, gamma, p_reflected_w, z_in_r, z_in_x), hardware_source (auto/custom). POST /api/calculate with feed_type=hairpin returns matching_info with z_in_r, z_in_x, gamma_mag, p_forward_w, p_reflected_w, p_net_w fields. For R >= 50, topology_note is returned. Frontend modal accessed via 'Hairpin Match Designer' button when Hairpin feed type selected.

hairpin_length_sweep.note: 60+ sweep points with SWR curve and power analysis

hairpin_auto_hardware_selection.note: Auto-selects rod_dia from [0.125-0.375] and rod_spacing from [0.5-2.0] that gives SWR closest to 1.0

hairpin_custom_hardware.note: custom_rod_dia and custom_rod_spacing override auto-selection, hardware_source='custom'

hairpin_topology_note_for_r_ge_50.note: For R >= 50, returns topology_note suggesting Gamma match instead

calculate_hairpin_reflection_physics.note: Complex impedance + reflection coefficient physics in /api/calculate

components: EXCELLENT MATCH banner (SWR, Q Match, Feedpoint R)
HARDWARE section (Rod Dia, Rod Spacing, Z0)
SWR vs HAIRPIN LENGTH sweep chart

apply_recipe_button.note: Pushes hairpin_length, rod_dia, rod_spacing back to calculator when clicked
